S -> A B
A -> a
B -> b

S -> A B
A -> a
B -> b

test_cfg_utils.cfg_text:
S -> A S | ending
A -> a

S -> A S | ending
A -> a

test_cfg_utils.cfg_text:
S -> A B | ending
A -> B S
B -> b

S -> A B | ending
A -> B S
B -> b

test_cfg_utils.cfg_text:
S -> A B

B -> epsilon

B -> epsilon

test_cfg_utils.cfg_text:
S -> A B C D E
A -> a
B -> b
C -> c
D -> d
E -> e
test_cfg_utils.expected_wcnf:
S -> A C#CNF#1
C#CNF#1 -> B C#CNF#2
C#CNF#2 -> C C#CNF#3
C#CNF#3 -> D E
A -> a
B -> b
C -> c
D -> d
E -> e

test_cfg_utils.cfg_text: S -> a b c d e
test_cfg_utils.expected_wcnf:
S -> "VAR:a#CNF#" C#CNF#1
C#CNF#1 -> "VAR:b#CNF#" C#CNF#2
C#CNF#2 -> "VAR:c#CNF#" C#CNF#3
C#CNF#3 -> "VAR:d#CNF#" "VAR:e#CNF#"
a#CNF# -> a
b#CNF# -> b
c#CNF# -> c
d#CNF# -> d
e#CNF# -> e

S -> "VAR:a#CNF#" C#CNF#1
C#CNF#1 -> "VAR:b#CNF#" "VAR:c#CNF#"
a#CNF# -> a
b#CNF# -> b
c#CNF# -> c

test_cfg_utils.cfg_text:
S -> a B c
B -> b
test_cfg_utils.expected_wcnf:
S -> "VAR:a#CNF#" C#CNF#1
C#CNF#1 -> B "VAR:c#CNF#"
a#CNF# -> a
B -> b
c#CNF# -> c

test_cfg_utils.cfg_text:
S -> A
A -> B
B -> b

S -> a B C | epsilon
B -> E b
E -> epsilon
C -> B | c F
 F -> E
test_cfg_utils.expected_wcnf:
S -> "VAR:a#CNF#" C#CNF#1 | epsilon
C#CNF#1 -> B C
B -> E "VAR:b#CNF#"
E -> epsilon
C -> E "VAR:b#CNF#" | "VAR:c#CNF#" F
F -> epsilon
a#CNF# -> a
b#CNF# -> b
c#CNF# -> c
